kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Dado que acesso na página de cadastro de produtos
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Text
kw.msg: ${Nome} = Fugiat blanditiis possimus praesentium nam. Odio eaque mollitia sit fugiat saepe. Optio commodi unde quo.
kw.doc: Generate a text string.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Fugiat blanditiis possimus praesentium nam. Odio eaque mollitia sit fugiat saepe. Optio commodi unde quo.' into text field 'id:nome'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Numerify
kw.doc: Generate a string with each placeholder in ``text`` replaced according to the following rules:

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Texts
kw.msg: ${Descricao} = ['Quod cupiditate laborum. Aperiam dolorem eius esse. Maiores doloremque laudantium. Repellat tempora reiciendis dolore saepe.\nFuga nam eum. At odio deleniti reprehenderit suscipit asperiores dolor u...
kw.doc: Generate a list of text strings.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '['Quod cupiditate laborum. Aperiam dolorem eius esse. Maiores doloremque laudantium. Repellat tempora reiciendis dolore saepe.\nFuga nam eum. At odio deleniti reprehenderit suscipit asperiores dolor ut.', 'Adipisci esse distinctio illum dicta reiciendis. Saepe explicabo quasi ullam.\nVel alias excepturi eaque iure facere minus. Aspernatur atque fuga. Magni quos impedit rerum cupiditate.', 'Hic fugit impedit reiciendis aperiam temporibus ab. Ea adipisci quia laborum aut aliquam dolore. Laborum delectus corrupti debitis numquam aliquam totam veniam.']' into text field 'id:description'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Então visualizo a página de listagem de produtos
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
